body_html:
Frustratingly, it appears the (now) merged Caffe2 only supports CUDA 9.0 as well.
Question - surely there is a way to make releases future compatible with minor version updates?

For instance, would it be possible to make dynamic references to specific files, e.g cuda9.1,yy, to instead be changed to cuda9.Z.yy to retain compatibility with future minor versions?
